amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to construct or operate a streetcar in Cincinnati, Ohio.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to design, construct, or operate a fixed guideway project located in Cincinnati, Ohio.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Chabot.
